titles.title: To provide for the liquidation or reliquidation of certain entries.
To provide for the liquidation or reliquidation of certain entries.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary: Directs the Bureau of Customs and Border Protection to: (1) liquidate or reliquidate certain entries of roller chains without assessment of antidumping duties or interest; and (2) refund any amounts owed.
